allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add admin database export feature with UI

- Create admin module with database export service (read-only operations)
- Add endpoints: GET /admin/stats, GET /admin/export/database, GET /admin/export/collection/:name
- Add admin API calls to frontend
- Add Admin Settings section to profile page (visible only to admins)
- Show database statistics and collection details
- Export button downloads complete database as JSON backup
- Sensitive data (passwords, tokens) sanitized from exports

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add mobile responsiveness across the application

- Update DashboardLayout with mobile overlay drawer navigation
- Add hamburger menu and responsive controls to Header
- Make Sidebar mobile-friendly with close button and auto-close on nav
- Add responsive padding, typography, and grids to Dashboard, Projects, Issues, Profile pages
- Update Modal with full-width on mobile and stacked footer buttons
- Increase touch targets for Input and Select components (h-11 on mobile)
- Add snap scrolling and horizontal scroll to Kanban board for mobile

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
